通过参数`icon`来使用对应的不同类别的图标。.en-us: Use the parameter `icon` to use the corresponding category of icons.

通过`nClicks`进行图标点击事件的监听，特别地，在有效设置参数`debou.en-us: Listening to the icon click event through `nClicks`. Specifically, after setting the parameter `debounceWait` effectively, a debounced listening will be applied to the click event to prevent it from being triggered too frequently.
